name: Bunny Foot
description:
Help the bunny get to his final destination. In this Harrowing and difficult journey will you be able to make it to the end?

Including:

  • 10 artistic nature filled levels
  • 3 enemy types  an 3 nature obstacles
  • Bash system (similar to Ori)
  • Beautiful soundtrack (credit to GWRITERSTUDIO) 

My 2nd week with Unity and my 2nd game, this game took 5 days to create, admittedly a good chunk of that was spent on creating the backgrounds and characters.

  • Controls:
  • 'A' and 'D' or right and left will move the character
  • 'W', Space, or the up key will Jump
  • click and hold the left mouse button when in proximity of flying object or enemy to initialize the bash system. Move mouse arrow to direction you want to go and release the left mouse button. Flying object will go in the opposite direction.

I hope you enjoy
